mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_words(text):
    cleaned_text = re.sub('', '', text.lower())
    words = cleaned_text.split()
    ignore = set(['btw', 'lol'])
    word_counts = Counter((word for word in words if word not in ignore))
    return word_counts

import re
from collections import Counter

def count_words(text):
    cleaned_text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', text.lower())
    words = cleaned_text.split()
    ignore = set(['btw', 'lol'])
    word_counts = Counter((word for word in words if word not in ignore))
    return word_counts

mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_words(text):
    cleaned_text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', text.lower())
    words = cleaned_text.split()
    ignore = set(['btw', 'lol'])
    word_counts = Counter((word for word in words if word in ignore))
    return word_counts
